description: With an elastic drawstring waist and a roomy fit, these lightweight pants draw inspiration from our signature Polo Prepster shorts.
fitting_details: Stretch Classic Fit: sits at the waist. Eased through the leg.
Size Big 2X has 43" waist that expands to 50", a 12½" rise, and a 28" inseam.
Size Tall 2L has 43" waist that expands to 50", a 12½" rise, and a 32" inseam.
Elastic waistband with an interior drawstring. Zip fly with a buttoned closure.
Two front angled pockets. Two back buttoned pockets.
Signature embroidered Pony above the back right pocket.
